description: MongoDB Atlas Vector Store with search capabilities

mongodb_atlas_client_cert.info:
Client Certificate combined with the private key in the following format:
 -----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----
...
 -----END PRIVATE KEY-----
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
...
-----END CERTIFICATE-----

index_name.info: The name of Atlas Search index, it should be a Vector Search.

insert_mode.info: How to insert new documents into the collection.

filter_field.info: The field to filter the index.

similarity.info: The method used to measure the similarity between vectors.

quantization.info: Quantization reduces memory costs converting 32-bit floats to smaller data types
